this_title: 星期二特写：我们这一代
introduction: Born between 1980-2000, Millennials made up about 23% of the world population. They’re often described as “self-entitled, delicate, arrogant and impatient”. In this new series, 16 millennials bare their soul with soundbites on self-fulfillment, love, family and work. Being digital natives, why do millennials live by the Axim “YOLO- You only live once” and what drives them to “change the world”? 1980-2000年代生出生的千禧一代占全球总人口约23%，常被雇主形容为“以自我为中心、脆弱、傲慢、没耐性、要求多付出少”。全新系列通过16位千禧青年的告白，聆听他们对成就、爱情、家庭和工作最赤裸的想法。一起去了解在网络数码时代中成长的他们为何追求我行我素（YOLO），为何把持着改变世界的承诺。
chinese_title: 星期二特写：我们这一代
